title: Ur-Quan Masters 3DO Videos
description:
April 10, 2008

Ur-Quan Masters supports the 3DO intro and ending videos and ship spin videos,
but the casual user would never know it.

QUOTE: "The 3DO version also included intro, ending and ship presentation videos ("ship spins").
UQM 0.6.2 supports the intro and ending videos, but they are not available for download
for copyright reasons. The ship spins are similarly not available, but are supported in the
current development version of UQM (which will become the next release)." END QUOTE

Unfortunately, these videos are impossible to find in a form usable by UQM, you have to make them yourself.

Until now that is. :)

Now, when you select the 3DO videos option in UQM, you will actually see a video:

Instead of the normal (but very cool) slideshow:

To see the spins, go to Super Melee, highlight a ship, and hit the RIGHT ALT key.
This works in the game too I think.

Enjoy your new videos!
